title: Urgent search for Savannah Guthrie's missing mother | 7NEWS
description: Nancy Guthrie, the 84-year-old mother of Today Show anchor Savannah Guthrie, has disappeared from her Tucson home under suspicious circumstances. Police believe she was abducted from her bed, with blood found inside the residence and a concerning scene discovered by investigators. The elderly woman requires crucial daily medications that could be fatal if missed for 24 hours, prompting an urgent search involving local and federal authorities as well as community volunteers. title: Australian scientists discover molecule that destroys breast cancer cells | 7NEWS
description: Australian scientists at QIMR Berghofer have discovered a new RNA molecule that specifically targets and destroys hormone receptor positive breast cancer cells, which account for 70% of all breast cancers. The molecule showed remarkable results in laboratory testing, completely eliminating advanced breast tumour cells within hours while leaving normal cells unharmed. This world-first discovery offers hope for treating drug-resistant and non-responding advanced breast cancers, particularly for the third of patients whose tumours don't respond to current treatments or develop resistance. title: Super Bowl 60 showdown features Aussie star | 7NEWS
description: Super Bowl 60 will be held at Levi's Stadium on Monday, with the Seattle Seahawks facing the New England Patriots before an expected global audience of more than 120 million viewers. NFL security has confirmed no planned ICE enforcement activities on game day, news welcomed by halftime performer Bad Bunny who has publicly condemned the agency. Sydney's Michael Dickson, a former AFL hopeful turned NFL punter, will play for the Seattle Seahawks as arguably the best and highest paid punter in the National Football League. title: First day of kindergarten for thousands of children | 7NEWS
description: Thousands of children across Australia attended their first day of kindergarten today, marking the beginning of their decade-long school journey. At St Michael's Primary School, the milestone was particularly special with three sets of twins starting school together. Parents and students experienced a mix of emotions during drop-off, with initial nerves giving way to excitement as the children settled into their new routine. title: Qantas recreates iconic 1947 'Kangaroo Route' from Sydney to London
description: Qantas has given passengers an opportunity to step back in time, retracing its iconic "Kangaroo route" from Sydney to London by flying between seven cities. #qantas #plane #avation #avgeek #airtravel
